ngiemboon: Tè mɔ́ɔn ńzẅíŋe nò gie à gɔɔn.
en: Don't even accept what he says.

ngiemboon: Tè mɔ́ɔn ńzẅíŋe nò gie à gɔɔn.
en: Don't even accept what he says.

ngiemboon: Yěsô la zíme na legwe á gwɔ́ kwàʼ nò mɔɔn mɔɔn.
en: Jesus was resurrected from the dead, it is truly an amazing thing.

ngiemboon: Yɛ̂ kwàʼ mɔɔn nò gie ɔ̀ shwóŋo wɔ́ɔn.
en: This is astonishing news that you are telling me.

ngiemboon: À lúɔ pɔ́ mmó mpfɛ̀ pfɛ̌
À lúɔ pɔ́ mmó mpfɛ̀ pfɛ̌
en: he doesn't ask what he's going to sell.

ngiemboon: à těen ńdúɔ ye sẅiŋ wɔ́.
à těen ńdúɔ ye sẅiŋ wɔ́.
en: he doesn't ask what he's going to sell.
